Beautifully designed and nestled within the iconic Birks Building, Hôtel Birks offers a distinctive and unforgettable experience where guests are immersed into an exquisite French flair. In 1894, the historic Montreal building was built by Henry Birks to house the jewelery store. Since then, the building was expanded in 1907 and restored in 2001. In 2018, this historic building welcome the Hotel Birks Montreal by les Hotels St Martin Inc .; luxury boutique hotel with 132 rooms & suites. Adjacent to the hotel, Henri Brasserie Française serves traditional and contemporary French brasserie cuisine.

Reviews

Reviews summary
This summary was created by AI, based on recent reviews.
Powered by AI
Hotel Birks Montreal is praised for its central location, making it convenient for exploring the city, according to many travelers. While the elegant atmosphere and stylish rooms often earn positive remarks, some guests note drawbacks like noise and unconventional layouts. Service experiences vary, with many appreciating the friendly staff, though others report inconsistencies. Reviewers frequently mention that the hotel can feel pricey considering extra fees and small rooms, and some call out limited amenities and occasional cleanliness issues.
